doc:
Richard Chamberlain https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Chamberlain 0 George Richard Chamberlain (born March 31, 1934) is an American stage and screen actor and singer, who became a teen idol in the title role of the television show Dr. Kildare (1961–1966). Since then, he has appeared in several mini-series such as Shōgun (1980) and The Thorn Birds (1983), and many successful films such as The Bourne Identity (1988) being the first man to play Jason Bourne, and he has performed classical stage roles and worked in musical theatre. George_Richard_Chamberlain ( born March_31_,_1934 ) is an_American_stage_and_screen_actor_and_singer , who became a_teen_idol in the_title_role of the_television_show_Dr._Kildare ( 1961 – 1966 ) . Since then , he has_appeared in several_mini-series such_as Shōgun ( 1980_) and The_Thorn_Birds_(_1983_) , and many_successful_films such_as The_Bourne_Identity_(_1988_) being the_first_man to_play Jason_Bourne , and he has_performed classical_stage_roles and worked in musical_theatre .
